name: Don Tomas - Cameroon Collection - Perfecto No. 4
additionalNotes: Expertly handcrafted in Danl√≠, Honduras, this collection was launched in 2000. Each cigar is carefully handrolled to deliver a smooth, even burn. Created from the superb blending of aged tobaccos from three nations, bound in Dominican leaf, and then wrapped in a sun-grown Cameroon, this is a rich, spicy, and woodsy smoke certain to satisfy even the most discriminating connoisseur.
